intro: This wikiHow teaches how to re-enable an iPad that has been disabled due to too many incorrect passcodes.

steps.title: Restore a backup (if possible).
steps.subtitle: If you had previously backed up your device to iCloud, you can restore the backup during the setup process. Otherwise, just proceed as if the device is new.
sub-points: You'll still be able to redownload all of your apps and iTunes Store content, as well as recover your mail and messages, by signing in with the same iCloud account.
